title: Department of Home Affairs (Australia)
description: Official government site for visas, citizenship, and immigration policies.

title: SkillSelect (Expression of Interest)
description: Apply for skilled visas like Subclass 189, 190, and 491.

title: VETASSESS (Skills Assessment)
description: Skills assessment for trades and professions (e.g., engineers, nurses).

title: TRA (Trades Recognition Australia)
description: Skills assessment for trade occupations (e.g., electricians, carpenters).

title: ACS (IT Professionals Assessment)
description: Skills assessment for IT and computer science professionals.

title: Temporary Graduate Visa (Subclass 485)
description: Post-study work visa for international students.

title: Skilled Independent Visa (Subclass 189)
description: Points-tested visa for permanent residency (no sponsor required).

title: State Nomination Visas (Subclass 190/491)
description: State-sponsored PR pathways for skilled workers.

title: Australian Immigration News Updates
description: Latest changes to immigration rules and policies.

title: Points Calculator for PR
description: Check eligibility for skilled visas based on points.

title: Migration Agents Registration Authority
description: Find registered migration agents for legal advice.
